类 CTriangleButton

java.lang.Object
org.kelvinizer.buttons.KButton
org.kelvinizer.buttons.CTriangleButton
所有已实现的接口:
Drawable, Focusable, Scalable
public class CTriangleButton extends KButton
The CTriangleButton class represents a button with a triangular shape and two states: normal and focused. It extends KButton and provides functionality for rendering, scaling, and focus handling.

  • 字段概要

    从类继承的字段 org.kelvinizer.buttons.KButton

    • setNormal

      public void setNormal(CTriangle c)
      Sets the normal state of the triangle button.
      参数:
      c - the CTriangle representing the normal state

    • setOnFocus

      public void setOnFocus(CTriangle c)
      Sets the onFocus state of the triangle button.
      参数:
      c - the CTriangle representing the focused state

    • setFocused

      public void setFocused(MouseEvent e)
      Updates the focused state of the button based on the mouse event.
      参数:
      e - the MouseEvent triggering the focus update

    • scale

      public void scale(Dimension d)
      Scales the button's triangular bounds based on the given dimensions.
      参数:
      d - the Dimension to scale to

    • render

      public void render(Graphics2D g2d)
      Renders the triangle button based on its current state.
      参数:
      g2d - the Graphics2D object to render with
